name: Football Arcade 2019
description:
Swipe, shoot and score. Football Arcade is a great new and totally free football experience for everyone! Hit targets and collect all the stars until you can face off in an epic bossfight. A very strong keeper awaits your arrival to see if you can beat him! Or play for a leaderboard position in the Endless Mode. Challenge your friends to beat your score and claim your top position.

Football Arcade allows you to have a quick and fun experience for when you need a small break in your busy life. You can curve your shots into the top bin of the goal, unreachable for the goalkeeper.

Key features:
• Target practice football levels
• Epic goalkeeper bossfights
• Thrilling Endless Mode against a leveling up goalkeeper
• Realtime leaderboard

Download Football Arcade for free now and enjoy the newest levels and boss fights!
More levels and bossfights coming soon.

This game requires an internet connection and allows users to watch video’s to refund their energy or purchase unlimited energy.
Visit us at www.gamebasics.nl
